Posts.Content: Feb 26, 2010 10:07AM NanaB516 wrote: I was on the combo Abraxene and Avastin for about 8 weeks.  When I first started I was 2 weeks on with one week off.  The dr switched me to 1 wk on 1 week off and I was able to tolerate the SE better.  After 8 wks.  it stopped working for me and my Dr put me on Cistplatin and Gemzar.  That also stopped working after 8 weeks.  I am now on Ixempia and Xeloda.  I must say the SE from this combo are worse - fatigue, leg pain, body aches, etc.  Good luck to your Mom. NanaB
Posts.Title: Switching Mom to Abraxane sincitydealer traciedg

Posts.Content: NanaB516 wrote: Just had my 2nd PET scan.  Good news/bad news.  The Abraxane/Avastin has stopped working on my liver mets. The lesion in liver had increased 2cm.  Bone mets is stable. Had been on this since April.   Monday my Dr started me on Cisplatin/Gemzar.   Will do 2 weeks on - 1 week off.  However, nurse indicated that it would more likely be 1 week on - 1 week off due to side effects.  Is anyone having this combo or have had it in the past?  Would appreciate any information- side effects? tolerance?  results? how long on it?  Had Decadron as premeds.  It's 4:30 am and I'm wide awake!!!!!!!!!!  BK Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Cisplatin-Gemzar Combo NanaB516 sydpen2
